overview.en: PTG is a distributed financial system based on blockchain. It is committed to promoting the development and improvement of the distributed financial DeFi ecosystem, creating on-chain finance, and then building an efficient distributed financial DeFi ecological infrastructure.
overview.zh: PTG是基于区块链的分布式金融系统，致力于推动分布式金融DeFi生态的发展和完善，打造链上金融，进而搭建高效运行的分布式金融DeFi生态基础设施。
